pl.touk.hades
Interface Monitor

All Superinterfaces:
ConnectionListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
SqlTimeBasedMonitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl, SqlTimeBasedTimerTaskMonitor
public interface Monitor
extends ConnectionListener

Each instance of this class monitors both data sources of a hades and can tell if failover should or should not be active for the hades. The associations between hadeses and monitors are "one-to-one".

Author:
Michal Sokolowski

Method Summary
 Hades getHades()
          Returns hades associated with this monitor.
 Load getLoad()
          Returns current load containing main and failover data base load levels of the associated hades.
 boolean isFailoverActive()
          Returns true if failover is active and false otherwise.
 
Methods inherited from interface pl.touk.hades.ConnectionListener
connectionRequestedFromHades
 

Method Detail

isFailoverActive

boolean isFailoverActive()
Returns true if failover is active and false otherwise. This method controls the process of switching between tha main and the failover data sources contained inside the hades associated with this monitor. For more details see methods Hades.getConnection() and Hades.getConnection(String, String) which invoke this method to learn whether failover is active or not.

Returns:
true if failover is active or false otherwise

getHades

Hades getHades()
Returns hades associated with this monitor.

Returns:
hades associated with this monitor

getLoad

Load getLoad()
Returns current load containing main and failover data base load levels of the associated hades.

Returns:
current load of the associated hades
